result.arabic_text: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا
result.translation: Iyo abagarariji mu bantu no mu Majini barongoka mu nzira y’ukwemera Imana Allah, bakaba abislamu, Twebwe Allah, Twari kubaronsa amazi menshi cane bakoroherwa mu kuronka ibibabeshaho mu buzima bwo kw’isi;
